name: Sorter (implementer76) (implementer76)
description:
A chill game for people who like organizing, categorizing, classifying, arranging, grouping, cataloguing or just sorting in general.

How to play

Click to move boxes around the map. The goal is to have all boxes close to at least another identical box. You can organize it any way you prefer, as long as no box is left without an identical neighbor.

Controls

  • Click to pick up all adjacent boxes of the same type.
  • Right click to pick up one individual box.
  • R to rotate held boxes.
  • WASD to move around.
  • Mouse wheel to zoom.
